Lester Mattice

  1. Foster Name: Lester
  2. Alternate Foster Name: Stub
  3. Foster Family: Lou L. and Agnes Belle Studer
  4. Location of Family: Falls City, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Falls City, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 19 mos.
  8. Date of Birth: 1913-08-10
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: We Are Part of History: The Story of the Orphan Trains by Michael Patrick, Evelyn Sheets and Evelyn Trickel, p. 138-140; Orphan Train Riders Cookbook and Other Good Stuff, p. 45-46.
